question: Which are the basin countries of the "Coco River"?
explanation: Honduras and Nicaragua are the basin countries of the "Coco River". The Coco River, also known as the Rio Segovia or Cape River or Yara River, is a river in northern Nicaragua and southern Honduras. The Miskito Indians who live along the river know it as the Wanki or Wanks River. It is the longest river that runs entirely within the Central American isthmus.
